about_externalLink_bugTracker.description: External link in 'About' section leading to GitHub Issues in the bottom of the options page.

about_externalLink_communityForum.description: External link in 'About' section leading to GitHub Discussions in the bottom of the options page.

about_externalLink_privacyPolicy.description: External link in 'About' section leading to Privacy Policy article in the bottom of the options page.

about_externalLink_releaseNotes.description: External link in 'About' section leading to GitHub Releases in the bottom of the options page.

about_externalLink_sourceCode.description: External link in 'About' section leading to GitHub in the bottom of the options page.

about_externalLink_userManual.description: External link in 'About' section leading to GitHub Wiki in the bottom of the options page.

bookmarkBrowser_noBookmarks_label.message: Add your first bookmarks to start using Camellia
bookmarkBrowser_noBookmarks_label.description: The message is displayed when there are no bookmarks stored in a browser.

bookmarkCategory_bookmarksBar_label.description: Label of the bookmark category that contains bookmarks from 'Bookmarks bar' folder.

bookmarkCategory_otherBookmarks_label.description: Label of the bookmark category that contains bookmarks from 'Other bookmarks' folder.

bookmarkSearch_textField_modalTitle.description: Title of the modal with search field.

bookmarkSearch_textField_placeholder.description: Shown in the search text field when its empty.

bookmarkSearch_tip_ctrlF.message: Tip: You can open search with <kbd>$KEY$</kbd> + <kbd>K</kbd> shortcut

bookmarkSearch_tip_enterKey.message: Tip: Press <kbd>$KEY$</kbd> to open first link

bookmarkSearch_tip_escKey.message: Tip: You can close search with <kbd>Esc</kbd>

bookmarkSearch_tip_pressingAnyCharacter.message: Tip: You may press any character to open search

bottomToolbar_bookmarkManager_label.description: Label on the button that opens default browser's bookmark manager located in bottom toolbar.

bottomToolbar_options_label.description: Label on the button that opens extension options page (settings) located in bottom toolbar. This button should use the same term as browser uses.

bottomToolbar_search_label.description: Label on the button that opens bookmark search.

extensionDescription.message: View all your browser bookmarks at the new tab screen.

option_analytics_description.message: We're gathering anonymous usage statistics via Google Analytics. We need such data to be sure our updates make Camellia better. We don't track links you visit, we don't analyze your bookmarks and folders names. At this moment there's no way to disable this option.

option_backgroundBrightness_description.message: If background image is too bright for you, you may reduce its brightness.

option_backgroundImageLink_description.message: Link pointing to the image. It should start with "https://".

option_backgroundImageUnsplashCollection.message: Link pointing to Unsplash collection in form of "$URL$".
Could not find a collection by given link

option_blurBackground_description.message: Makes background image blurred. It may be useful if you feel too much distraction from detailed background images.

option_contentLayout_description.message: Should content be centered or not. Centering content may be useful for people with wide displays.

option_copyDebugInformation_description.message: Information that may be helpful for debugging purposes will be copied to your clipboard by pressing the button. You are safe to share this information with community of contributors via GitHub issues in case you wish to report a bug you discovered in Camellia.

option_displayPhotographerAttribution_de.message: By default, Camellia displays photographer's name in bottom toolbar, which can be clicked to open full photo if you wish to save it or explore more photos of the author. The attribution may be hidden in case you don't want it to be displayed.

option_resetOptions_description.message: Pressing this button will reset all your options and preferences in Camellia to default values without confirmation! ⚠️

option_sentry_description.message: We're using Sentry to track errors in Camellia. At this moment there's no way to disable this option.
option_sentry_description.description: Text that appears near form control.

option_sentry_label.description: Text that appears next to checkbox icon.

option_showBookmarkManagerButton_descrip.message: Show "Bookmark Manager" button in bottom toolbar.

option_showSearchButton_description.message: Show "Search" button in bottom toolbar. You may use <kbd>$KEY$</kbd> + <kbd>K</kbd> shortcut to open the search window using a keyboard.

optionsPage_optionControl_learnMoreLink.description: A link that refers to some external website or documentation.

popup_closeButton_label.description: Label of the close button in popup. This text shown when hovering the button.

popup_content_emptyFolder.description: Text shown within popup when bookmark list is empty.
